flawed_nl_solution:
The sum of mangoes, pears and pawpaws is 18+10+12 = <<18+10+12=40>>40
The total number of fruits is 58 so the last two baskets contain 58-40 = <<58-40=20>>20 fruits
Each of the last two baskets contains an equal amount of fruits which is 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 fruits
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 20. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
